lead_paragraph: Chris Froome describes Saturday's Olympic men's road race as a lottery but the Briton will still fancy his chances of winning gold alongside the Copacabana despite a brutal course that plays into the hands of his rivals.

headline.print_headline: Froome to Take Chances in Rio Road Race Lottery
headline.main: Froome to Take Chances in Rio Road Race Lottery

snippet: Chris Froome describes Saturday's Olympic men's road race as a lottery but the Briton will still fancy his chances of winning gold alongside the Copacabana despite a brutal course that plays into the hands of his rivals....
